metadata.name: Ghost Babel - Nightwatches!
metadata.description:
REQUIRED MODS Antibirth Monster Library - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2614001143
The cut monster from Antibirth makes a return! The vigilant Nightwatch lurks in the darkness, calling in backup and despawning valuable goodies that could have been grabbed if they spot you!
Adds 110 Nightwatch room scattered throughout Mausoleum, Ascent and maybe some other secrets?
